OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

params.defaultFeeBps_: Default fee percentage in basis points
params.defaultFeeFixedErc20_: Default fixed fee for ERC-20 mints
params.defaultFeeFixedNative_: Default fixed fee for native mints

returns.collection: Address of the newly created collection

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.feeFixedErc20_: New default fixed fee for ERC-20 mints
params.feeFixedNative_: New default fixed fee for native mints

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

allCollections(uint256).notice: Array of all collections created by this factory

defaultErc20().notice: Default ERC-20 token for payments (e.g., USDC on Base)

defaultFeeBps().notice: Default fee percentage in basis points (010000)

defaultFeeFixedErc20().notice: Default fixed fee for ERC-20 mints

defaultFeeFixedNative().notice: Default fixed fee for native (ETH) mints

feeRecipient().notice: Address that receives Rarible fees from all collections

getCollectionCount().notice: Get the total number of collections created

getCollections(uint256,uint256).notice: Get a paginated list of collections

isCollection(address).notice: Mapping to check if an address is a collection created by this factory

setDefaultErc20(address).notice: Update the default ERC-20 token for new collections

setDefaultFees(uint16,uint256,uint256).notice: Update default fee configuration for new collections

userdoc.notice: Factory contract that deploys LiveDropCollection (ERC-721) contracts         for Live Stream Drops. Each live stream can create a unique NFT collection.
